item.description:
EI changes topic of MP's forum
The office of MP Malcolm Allen is hosting a town hall meeting Wednesday in the Community Room at Welland Civic Square to discuss the changes. The two-hour session starts at 7 p.m.. The New Democrat, will be joined by guest speakers, and will talk about ...

item.title: Mentioned by Bullet News Niagara
item.description:
COMMUNITY: Welland MP hosts town hall meeting Wednseday over EI issues
WELLAND – Member of Parliament, Malcolm Allen will be hosting a community town hall to discuss recent changes to the Employment Insurance program and their impacts on Niagara. Employment Insurance was established to act as a group insurance plan ...

item.title: Mentioned by Powell River Peak
item.description:
Agriculture critic talks policy
Ontario MP Malcolm Allen made a stop in Powell River last week on his cross-country agricultural tour. The federal NDP (New Democratic Party) agriculture critic met up with his provincial counterpart, Powell River-Sunshine Coast MLA Nicholas Simons to ...

item.title: Mentioned by Welland Tribune
item.description:
Grilling time for Welland MP, MPP
MP Malcolm Allen and MPP Cindy Forster, both of whom represent the New Democratic Party, are planning the free community event to take place at Memorial Park, from 4 p.m. to 7 p.m. on Thursday, Aug. 29. The venue is on Memorial Park Dr. in Welland, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Kamloops This Week
item.description:
NDP's Allen talks food strategy in Kamloops
When you talk agriculture with the NDP member of Parliament charged with critiquing the government in that area, there are so many topics that can be discussed. For example, on the federal government's decision to close its agriculture-research centre in Kamloops: “It's obvious the government wants out of private research,” said Malcolm Allen, the MP for Welland in Ontario and member of the federal NDP shadow cabinet. Allen was in Kamloops this week as part of a B.C. tour. “General research as a public good is ...
